Q27: The story is intresting because it is a real picture of everyday life, because all could happen in our life, that can be positive or negative. Life is unpredictable and all could change from a day to other. We must be aware about this.

I think that a person can easily identify with Marco, because it seems that everything happened by chance. Therefore, the question that arises spontaneously is "Could it happen to me too?". Consequently,  we feel empathy you feel for him.

This story reminded me of two different movies that I saw years and years ago, but they “came back in fashion” during the pandemic period. One of them was called Blindness and the other Perfect Sense. In both movies, people lose their sight. Hence, although I do not know if these movies are related to this text, this narrative sounded familiar to me.What is more, I really enjoyed this work and I sure would have liked to go on with the plot. The style is very consistent with the dramatic tone of the story.  Still, I honestly do not particularly appreciate  the way direct speech is reported within sentences.
